greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of integral_{x=1..infinity} 1/x^x dx.
comment: Conjecturally, equals 1 - Integral_{x = 1..inf, y = 1..inf} 1/(x*y)^(x*y) dx dy. (End)
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge University Press, 2003, Section 4.6 Fransén-Robinson Constant, p. 263.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
results.author: _Jean-François Alcover_, Jul 28 2014
